attributes.action: Investigate why people were unable to register their votes against road charging
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I tried 6 times to sign the petition against a road charging scheme. This was over a number of days after it had become "hot news". 

I would ask you to sign this petition to ask the PM to explain why I, and no doubt others, was able to sign other (less newsworthy) petitions straight away (within minutes) but failed on EVERY occasion to be able to sign the one petition that I felt most strongly about.

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
